description: Numbers that are congruent to {5, 6} mod 8.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n)=8*n-a(n-1)-5, n>1. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 06 2010]G.f. x*(5+x+2*x^2) / ( (1+x)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Dec 07 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
